product_name: C.A.M.P. Orbit Express Nylon Quickdraw Set - 10cm Anodized - 2013 Overstock
long_description: With 2 Orbit key lock carabiners connected by a rugged nylon sling, the C.A.M.P. USA Orbit Express Nylon Quickdraw Set is lightweight and has exceptional clipping action for use on tough sport routes. Features a bent Orbit carabiner on the rope end of the quickdraw to enable quick clipping of the rope. Includes a straight Orbit carabiner on the bolt end of the quickdraw. Both carabiners have key lock noses that won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making them simple to clip. Smooth gate action offers just the right amount of resistance when clipping. 10cm-long nylon sling connects the 'biners and keeps overall weight low; each C.A.M.P. USA Orbit Express Nylon Quickdraw Set weighs 94g. Anodized carabiners make it easy to identify the bolt end and rope end of the quickdraw. Webbing color may vary; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated. Overstock.
short_description: With 2 Orbit key lock carabiners connected by a rugged nylon sling, the C.A.M.P. USA Orbit Express Nylon Quickdraw Set is lightweight and has exceptional clipping action for use on tough sport routes.
